definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: Can DLL in . NET use a different extension, e. g. MLL?
sentences.chinese: 可以动态链接库。网用不同的扩展名，如MLL？

sentences.english: A DLL loaded by the program loader at the same time as the application program that uses it is loaded.
sentences.chinese: 在程序载入的同时又程序加载器载一个动态链接库。

sentences.english: Error launching application, a dynamic-link library was not found.
sentences.chinese: 启动应用程序出错，找不到动态链接库。

sentences.english: A dynamic link library (DLL) initialization routine failed.
sentences.chinese: 服务器动态链接库的版本不兼容。

sentences.english: Application programs may call functions from this DLL directly.
sentences.chinese: 程序可以从动态链接库中直接调用函数。

sentences.english: The most common event of interest is loading or unloading of a new shared library.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的事件是载入和卸载一个动态链接库。

definition: plug-in (software or hardware)/to plug in a component
